name: Knyttskogen
description:
Sit down. Rest your weary soul. Keep an eye on the fireplace. Come and go, do something else, come back; perhaps you will have a visitor or two.

Created in under 72 hours for 'Ludum Dare 46', with the theme "Keep it alive" using the Godot engine.

Audio credits:

  • "Fox, Vocal Cry, Distant, 01.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

Special note to streamers:

This is intended to be a slow paced experience. As such it may not work that well in more traditional streaming formats. Our recommendation is that you  keep it open in the background , coming back to it now and then, between playing other games.
